resources.string: Please enter your registered Email address
Authentication failed. Please re-enter username and password and retry.
Vehicle found in Invoiced and Not Received list
Vehicle not found in Invoiced and Not Received list
Receive Vehicle? Click Yes to receive vehicle into your current warehouse and No to dismiss.
Receive Vehicle? Click Yes to receive vehicle into your current warehouse and No to dismiss.
has not been found. Select the vehicle Item Code below. Click Ok to create a new Serial No entry on ERPNext and add this to the Invoiced but not Received list, Cancel to do nothing.
Please enter email addresses of recipients who should receive the latest IBNR list and click Send or hit Cancel to dismiss.
Comma separated email addresses of the recipients
Could not fetch item codes from ERPNext.
Could not create a new Serial No document on ERPNext with serial no:
. Vehicle received into your warehouse successfully.
Could not receive the vehicle on ERPNext.
Could not send email to intended recipients.
Vehicle required in current warehouse. Load Vehicle? Click Yes to load and No to cancel.
Vehicle needs to be loaded. Load Vehicle? Click Yes to load and No to cancel.
Vehicle not required to be moved today. Load Vehicle? Click Yes to load the vehicle and No to cancel.
Vehicle not required in current warehouse. Unload Vehicle? Click Yes to unload and No to cancel.
Vehicle needs to be unloaded. Unload Vehicle? Click Yes to unload and No to cancel.
Vehicle not required to be unloaded today. Unload Vehicle? Click Yes to unload and No to cancel.
All required vehicles have been unloaded. Do you want to load some vehicles on the truck? Click Load to go to Load Vehicles mode or Home to go back to Home page.
All required vehicles have not been unloaded. Do you want to load some vehicles on the truck? Click Load to go to Load Vehicles mode or Home to go back to Home page.
Vehicle is to be delivered today.
Vehicle status is not Allocated but not Delivered.
Vehicle does not have a valid booking reference number.
This vehicle should not be delivered. Do you want to deliver anyway? Click Yes to deliver and No to cancel.
Click here to get your current location
Welcome to a simple bar code scanner app that helps you track your vehicles

Welcome to the Simple Scanner App. This app helps you track vehicles. Please set the IP address of your server address below. This will be required only once at the time of installation. Click Next to continue.
Please enter your server address here
Please click on the scanner icon at the bottom left corner to scan a vehicle or the green tick to finish the task and go back to the home page

Click on the bar code scanner icon at the bottom left of the screen to scan the vehicle. Enter the Booking Reference Number below to be allocated to this vehicle and then click Allocate Vehicle to proceed. To continue scanning, click on the bar code scanner image below or click on the green tick on the bottom right to go back to home page.
The booking reference number is valid. Allocating the vehicle to the booking reference number
Complete this task to go back to home screen
There is no valid stock entry present on ERPNext. Could not submit the stock entry for the vehicle
This vehicle is not currently in your warehouse. Would you like to transfer this vehicle to your location now? Click Transfer to transfer now and Cancel to dismiss.
. Click OK to transfer on ERPNext.
Could not roll back previous sales invoice associated with this vehicle
The server did not respond with the right return code. Please check your input.
The control level is set to low on ERPNext server. Vehicle will be allocated to dummy customer, ignoring the given booking reference number.
The control level is set to medium on ERPNext server. The booking reference number does not exist. The vehicle will be allocated to a dummy customer.
Server Error: It appears that your base location has not been set on ERPNext. Please contact admin!
